references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms for smooth and strongly convex decentralized optimization over time-varying networks
references.reason: This paper establishes lower bounds and develops an optimal algorithm for smooth and strongly convex decentralized optimization, which is foundational to the current work.

references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms for smooth and strongly convex distributed optimization in networks
references.reason: This paper provides fundamental lower bounds and optimal algorithms for smooth and strongly convex distributed optimization, setting the benchmark for optimal algorithms in decentralized settings.

references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms for non-smooth distributed optimization in networks
references.reason: This paper extends the results of Scaman et al. (2017) to non-smooth settings, crucial for understanding the challenges addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Communication-efficient algorithms for decentralized and stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper offers communication-efficient algorithms for decentralized and stochastic optimization, complementing the work on optimal algorithms.

references.paper_title: Distributed optimization over time-varying directed graphs
references.reason: This paper studies the challenges of decentralized optimization over time-varying networks, providing valuable context and background for the work.
